mapper.sql: id, name_identity, remarks, create_date, update_date, is_valid
mapper.insert:
insert into st_identity
id,
name_identity,
remarks,
create_date,
update_date,
is_valid,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nameIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update st_identity
name_identity = #{nameIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update st_identity set name_identity = #{nameIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from st_identity
is_valid=1
and name_identity like concat('%',#{nameIdentity},'%')
and remarks like concat('%',#{remarks},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into st_identity (name_identity, remarks, create_date, update_date, is_valid) values (#{nameIdentity},#{remarks},#{createDate},#{updateDate},#{isValid})
